item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Creativity is knowing how to hide your sources" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Einstein
item.description: "Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy." -- Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Creativity is intelligence having fun." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rachel add a quote by maya angelou
item.description: "I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass." -- maya angelou

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Quotation is a serviceable substitute for wit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "If you hide your ignorance, no one will hit you and you'll never learn." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "I don't care if I pass your test, I don't care if I follow your rules. If you can cheat, so can I. I won't let you beat me unfairly - I'll beat you unfairly first. - Ender " -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "I've watched through his eyes, I've listened through his ears, and I tell you he's the one." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "When you really know somebody you can’t hate them. Or maybe it’s just that you can’t really know them until you stop hating them." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Neither love nor evil conquers all, but evil cheats more." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Charles J. Sykes
item.description: "Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could." -- Charles J. Sykes

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Happiness isn't something that depends on our surroundings...It's something we make inside ourselves." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "Hades raised an eyebrow. When he sat forward in his throne, shadowy faces appeared in the folds of his black robes, faces of torment,as if the garment was stitched of trapped souls from the Fields of Punishment, trying to get out. The ADHD part of me wondered, off-task, whether the rest of his clothes were made the same way. What horrible things would you have to do in your life to get woven into Hades' underwear?" -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Rachel add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "For those of you in the cheap seats I'd like ya to clap your hands to this one; the rest of you can just rattle your jewelry!" -- John Lennon

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is to not stop questioning." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "We dance for laughter, we dance for tears, we dance for madness, we dance for fears, we dance for hopes, we dance for screams, we are the dancers, we create the dreams." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I must be willing to give up what I am in order to become what I will be." -- Albert Einstein
